summary: Successfully updated the 'Join the group' button icon from a generic MessageCircle to a custom SVG Telegram paper plane icon that matches the official Telegram logo. Removed unused imports and maintained proper styling and sizing. The button now displays the recognizable Telegram visual identity that users will immediately associate with Telegram messaging.
current_status: All features are complete and refined: dynamic column suggestions for enrichment, comprehensive search functionality with CSV parsing and link processing, and a properly styled Telegram group button with the official paper plane icon in the header. The application is fully functional with enhanced market intelligence capabilities and community integration using authentic Telegram branding.
